00006 /* This class handles all the signals and signal passing to
00007    ORVSignaHandlers.  It MUST BE called from the main thread before
00008    any other threads are started. This is because it sets to block
00009    SIGINT, and every derived thread inherits this signal block.  
00010    It is easiest just to call this before any other OR object. 
00011 
00012    The proper call to make is like:
00013    ORHandlerThread handler;
00014    handler.StartThread()
00015 
00016    StopThread() does not need to be called, nor does it really work
00017    as advertised due to some inconsistencies between Mac os x, posix,
00018    linux standards etc.  Therefore, if you don't want a signal handling
00019    thread, then don't instantiate this class. 
00020    */
00021
